version_description: This update includes accessibility improvements for the iOS 9 release.
Technical update

We’ve listened to your feedback and have redesigned and improved the Vanquis Bank App.

The app has a fresh look and feel and comes with new features to help you manage your account on the move

-Simple registration process
-Quicker, easier Fingerprint Login
-Better navigation making it even easier to view your current balance, check how much you have available to spend and see your latest transactions
-More control – you can set up and manage your Direct Debit in the app
-Your last 6 months of statement summaries

Please note
-For your security the app does not work on jailbroken devices and is not supported on Beta versions of iOS.
-Existing app users will need to re-register once the app has updated
-You do not need to be registered for eVanquis online servicing to be able to register and use the Vanquis Bank App

We’ve listened to your feedback and added:
- iOS 11 Support
- An easier way to enter date of birth on registration
- A logout button
- Manage fingerprint authentication
- Contact us page
- Increased font that’s easier to read

New features in 6.1
- Refer a friend – Earn £25 each time you successfully refer a friend to Vanquis! Even better, you can do it as many times as you like (terms apply)
- Transactions have had a makeover

New features:
-Feedback – share your thoughts and help us continuously improve the app
-Notifications - we’ve done some work to enable push notifications
We’ve made changes to the look, feel and navigation
-Font is larger and darker making it easier to read
-There’s no longer a menu in the homepage, you’ll find everything you need along the bottom navigation bar
-Diagnostics – we’ve made tweaks in the background so that we can identify and fix bugs at a faster pace

- We’ve refreshed the home page to bring you a clearer view of your account and a fresh new look
- Balance Transfers have landed in the app – you’ll be able to see if you have an offer available and then complete a request in the app
- If you’re eligible for a Vanquis Loan you’ll be able to see your tailored offer in the More Menu

• We’ve introduced Pending Transactions to the app!
• If your card needs activating, we will either do this automatically when you register or prompt you to call us
• We’ve updated our Transactions page to make it easier to view your activity
• We’ve fixed a bug impacting some customers making debit card payments

What’s New
• We’ve introduced Pending Transactions to the app!
• If your card needs activating, we will either do this automatically when you register or prompt you to call us.
• We’ve updated our Transactions page to make it easier to view your activity
• We’ve fixed a bug impacting some customers making debit card payments

**Important Update:** You need to upgrade by midnight Friday 9th March to continue to use the app

Don't worry, you won't need to re-register your details again and after the update you'll be able to log back in and view your account.

What’s New
• You can now set up recurring payments using your registered debit card
• Improvements have been made to fix some minor bugs

• You can now set up recurring payments using your registered debit card
• We’ve made changes to the Balance Transfer screens. If you’re eligible for a Balance Transfer, we’ve made your interest rates clearer
• Some technical upgrades have been completed to make sure we’re using the most up to date software we can

We've made changes to our Balance Transfer screens. If you're eligible for a Balance Transfer, we've made your interest rates clearer.
Some technical upgrades have been completed to make sure we're using the most up to date software we can

• If you haven’t already, you can now select your credit limit increase preferences when you register for the Mobile App
• Improvements have been made to fix some minor bugs

• We’ve made some updates to support iOS 12
• A small number of screens have been updated with a new look and feel. Keep an eye out for more updates in the future!
• Improvements have been made to fix a small number of bugs

Release Notes - 6.6.9
- Updates have been made to support the new iPhone XS models
We have released a fix and customers can now register and log in using Face ID

Welcome to v6.7

This update contains bug fixes and behind the scenes work in preparation for feature updates.

Coming soon! Get ready for some big improvements to the payments screens. This update features some behind the scenes work in preparation for a new look payments screen and new offers – look out for these changes in the coming weeks.

This update will bring changes to the current payment journey, improving the look and feel and reducing the time taken to make a payment.

We've also fixed some minor bugs to improve performance.

This update will bring changes to the current payment journey, improving the look and feel and reducing the time taken to make a payment.
We've also fixed some minor bugs to improve performance.
This version contains a technical change behind the scenes.

This update contains bug fixes and behind the scenes work in preparation for feature updates.

Coming soon! If eligible, you’ll be able to complete a Money Transfer within the Mobile App.

Release 6.7.8
This update contains bug fixes and updates to make Direct Debits clearer.

Coming soon! You’ll soon be able to see pending payments made to your Vanquis card. Also, if you’re eligible you’ll be able to complete a Money Transfer within the Mobile App.

This update contains bug fixes and behind the scenes work in preparation for feature updates.

Coming soon! If eligible, we’ll ask for information to check if we can increase your credit limit.

Release 6.9.0
With this update you will shortly be able to:
•Download a PDF version of your monthly and annual statement. You’ll also be able to turn off paper statements if you wish to.
•If you’re eligible, you’ll be able to complete a credit limit increase within the App
We’ve made some back end changes in preparation for some future features and have fixed some bugs.

Release 6.9.2
Added support for iOS 13.

With this update you will be able to:
•Download a PDF version of your monthly and annual statement. You’ll also be able to turn off paper statements if you wish to.
•If you’re eligible, you’ll be able to complete a credit limit increase within the App

This release contains some preparation work for some upcoming features!

Release 6.9.3
This release contains some preparation work for some upcoming features!

Release 6.10.0
With this update you'll be able to view your contact details and update your phone numbers!
We've also made some changes to the credit limit increase journey so if you're eligible you'll be able to learn more about these.
The release contains a fix for a notifications issue

With this update you will be able to report your card lost or stolen.

We’ve also made some back end changes and have fixed some bugs.

This release contains:

* Some updates to our registration journey
* Additional security steps on a few of our features
* The option to report your card lost and stolen within the app
